name: Taya

skills.name: Daze Powder
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 50% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns.
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +5%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Damage Multiplier: 3.65 ATK

skills.name: Venom Kunai (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy 3 times. Each hit has a 75% chance of placing a 5% [Poison] debuff for 2 turns
Level 2: Damage +5%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Level 6: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 1.95 ATK

skills.name: Blood Boil (Cooldown: 4 turns)
skills.description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 75% chance of instantly activating any [Poison] debuffs and [HP Burn] debuffs on the target. Also has a 75% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
Level 2: Damage +10%
Level 3: Damage +10%
Level 4: Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 5: Buff/Debuff Chance +15%
Level 6: Cooldown -1
Damage Multiplier: 5.5 ATK
